Item.Name: Iron Anvil
Item.ToolTip: Used to craft items from metal bars

Item.Name: Magic Mirror
Item.ToolTip: Gaze in the mirror to return home

Item.Name: Cloud in a Bottle
Item.ToolTip: Allows the holder to double jump

Item.Name: Hermes Boots
Item.ToolTip: The wearer can run super fast

Item.Name: Starfury
Item.ToolTip: Causes stars to rain from the sky

Item.Name: Orb of Light
Item.ToolTip: Creates a magical orb of light

Item.Name: Hook
Item.ToolTip: Sometimes dropped by Skeletons and Piranha

Item.Name: Water Candle
Item.ToolTip: Holding this may attract unwanted attention

Item.Name: Aqua Scepter
Item.ToolTip: Sprays out a shower of water

Item.Name: Water Bolt
Item.ToolTip: Casts a slow moving bolt of water

Item.Name: Bomb
Item.ToolTip: A small explosion that will destroy some tiles

Item.Name: Dynamite
Item.ToolTip: A large explosion that will destroy most tiles

Item.Name: Grenade
Item.ToolTip: A small explosion that will not destroy tiles

Item.Name: Flamelash
Item.ToolTip: Summons a controllable ball of fire

Item.Name: Goldfish
Item.ToolTip: 'It's smiling, might be a good snack'

Item.Name: Blowpipe
Item.ToolTip: Allows the collection of seeds for ammo

Item.Name: Spelunker Potion
Item.ToolTip: Shows the location of treasure and ore

Item.Name: Water Walking Potion
Item.ToolTip: Allows the ability to walk on water

Item.Name: Pwnhammer
Item.ToolTip: Strong enough to destroy Demon Altars

Item.Name: Tinkerer's Workshop
Item.ToolTip: Allows the combining of some accessories

Item.Name: Cloud in a Balloon
Item.ToolTip: Allows the holder to double jump

Item.Name: Adamantite Headgear
Item.ToolTip2: 11% increased magic damage and critical strike chance

Item.Name: Spectre Boots
Item.ToolTip2: The wearer can run super fast

Item.Name: Holy Water
Item.ToolTip: Spreads the Hallow to some blocks

Item.Name: Unholy Water
Item.ToolTip: Spreads the corruption to some blocks

Item.Name: Clockwork Assault Rifle
Item.ToolTip2: Only the first shot consumes ammo

Item.Name: Moon Charm
Item.ToolTip: Turns the holder into a werewolf on full moons

Item.Name: Ruler
Item.ToolTip: Creates a grid on screen for block placement

Item.Name: Neptune's Shell
Item.ToolTip: Transforms the holder into merfolk when entering water

Item.Name: Crystal Bullet
Item.ToolTip: Creates several crystal shards on impact

Item.Name: Cursed Flame
Item.ToolTip: 'Not even water can put the flame out'

Item.Name: Mythril Anvil
Item.ToolTip: Used to craft items from mythril and adamantite bars

Item.Name: Dark Shard
Item.ToolTip: 'Sometimes carried by creatures in corrupt deserts'

Item.Name: Light Shard
Item.ToolTip: 'Sometimes carried by creatures in light deserts'

Item.Name: Star Cloak
Item.ToolTip: Causes stars to fall when injured

Item.Name: Philosopher's Stone
Item.ToolTip: Reduces the cooldown of healing potions

Item.Name: Cross Necklace
Item.ToolTip: Increases length of invincibility after taking damage

Item.Name: Mana Flower
Item.ToolTip2: Automatically use mana potions when needed

Item.Name: Hallowed Headgear
Item.ToolTip2: 12% increased magic damage and critical strike chance

Item.Name: Hallowed Mask
Item.ToolTip: 10% increased melee damage and critical strike chance

Item.Name: Music Box
Item.ToolTip: Has a chance to record songs

Item.Name: Hamdrax
Item.ToolTip: 'Not to be confused with a hamsaw'
